data.message:
Leon's 1 world order idea

I believe in a NEW WORLD COUNCIL here within the United States we take our crooked congressmen and senators we make them governors of the states they represent so they can redistribute there campaign wealth back into there state they govern...then we take the worlds family's of predominant wealth and power and stick them within the house of representatives (Celebrities/ families of wealth and power)....this NEW WORLD COUNCIL and its leader has control over our military... in essence it unifys the world to combat the global terrosim issue...and unifies our global economy...it also works to rid the world of tyranny and fear in a global effort!
